Component.name: MicrosoftÂ® Exception Message Box
Component.Remarks: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=20101 (Feature Pack for Microsoft SQL Server 2005 SP4) x86: ENU\x86\SQLServer2005_EMB.msi x64: ENU\x64\SQLServer2005_EMB.msi
Component.Description: The exception message box is a programmatic interface that you can use in your applications for any tasks for which MessageBox may be used. The exception message box is a supported managed assembly designed to elegantly handle managed code exceptions. It provides significantly more control over the messaging experience and gives your users the options to save error message content for later reference and to get help on messages.
